forge.ethyr.torch.utils module¶

forge.ethyr.torch.utils.classify(logits)¶

Sample an action from logits

forge.ethyr.torch.utils.initWeights(net, scheme='orthogonal')¶

Provides multiple weight initialization schemes

Parameters

  • net – network to initialize

  • scheme – otrhogonal, normal, or xavier

forge.ethyr.torch.utils.modelSize(net)¶

Print model size

forge.ethyr.torch.utils.moduleList(module, *args, n=1)¶

Repeat module n times

forge.ethyr.torch.utils.pack(val)¶

Pack values to tensor

forge.ethyr.torch.utils.unpack(vals, lens)¶

Unpack value tensor using provided lens
